text: Ingrid Schjelderup (born 21 December 1987) is a Norwegian footballer who is a midfielder for Vålerenga of the Norwegian Toppserien. She has previously played for Norwegian Toppserien clubs Kolbotn, Vålerenga and Stabæk as well as Sweden's Linköpings FC and Italy's Fiorentina. She made her debut for the Norway women's national football team in March 2009 and was part of her country's squad at the 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup. ==Club career== In November 2009, Schjelderup and Nora Holstad Berge both left Kolbotn to join Swedish Damallsvenskan champions Linköpings FC. Schjelderup returned to Sweden in December 2015, joining Eskilstuna United DFF from Stabæk on a one-year contract. She declared that she was looking forward to representing one of the Damallsvenskan's best teams. In January 2018 Schjelderup went back to Norway and Vålerenga. ==International career== Schjelderup made her senior Norway women's national football team debut in March 2009, in a 2–0 Algarve Cup win over Denmark. After that tournament, Schjelderup was not called up again until 2014. She was selected in Even Pellerud's squad for the 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * * Norwegian national team profile * Stabæk club profile * Swedish FA profile * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Fredrikstad Category:Norwegian women's footballers Category:Norway women's international footballers Category:Toppserien players Category:Kolbotn Fotball players Category:Vålerenga Fotball Damer players Category:Stabæk Fotball Kvinner players Category:Norwegian expatriate sportspeople in Sweden Category:Norwegian expatriate footballers Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Sweden Category:Linköpings FC players Category:Eskilstuna United DFF players Category:Damallsvenskan players Category:2015 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Holmlia SK players
title: Ingrid Schjelderup (footballer)
